p: In brief, for Norwegian municipalities we obtained publicly available information on population sizes, latitude and longitude coordinates, altitude landscapes, flow of passengers traveling between Norwegian airports, and daily temperature and specific humidity records ( S1 Fig). We also obtained population sizes, latitude and longitude coordinates, temperature, and humidity data for counties in Norway, Sweden, and Denmark ( S2 Fig), and cities in the US. Further details of these data and where they can be obtained are given in S1 Text.
